title: Didnt Receive Conqueror Karma Border
body: I bought the Conqueor Karma on the day it came out but didnt received any borders that comes with the skin. Help?

replies.body: In order to have the special border appear, I believe you need to have purchased the bundle that came with the skin and icon. Once you have the icon and the skin selected, then that fancy border should appear on the loading screen!
